title: Fashion and lifestyle shopping
content:
# Myntra App Guide

## Navigation
- **Bottom Navigation Bar**: Switch between **Home**, **fwd** (Gen Z/Youth fashion store), **LUXE** (Luxury brands), and **Bag** (Cart).
- **Top Tabs**: Quickly toggle between main departments like **All**, **Men**, **Women**, and **Kids** on the Home screen.
- **Header Icons**: Access **Notifications** (bell), **Wishlist** (heart), and **Profile** settings via icons in the top-right corner.
- **Location**: Tap the "Deliver to..." strip at the top to change your delivery pincode or address.

## Search
- **Search Modes**: Use the search bar to type queries, tap the **Mic icon** for voice search, or use the **Camera icon** to search by photo/image.
- **Visual History**: The search screen displays **"Recent Searches"** with visual thumbnails of products you previously viewed.
- **Language Support**: The app may prompt you to search in Hindi (e.g., "Ab Hindi mein search karein!").

## Common Actions
- **Filter & Sort**: On search result pages, use the **Sort** and **Filter** buttons fixed at the bottom of the screen to refine your list.
- **Purchase**: On a product page, tap the large pink **Add to Bag** button to save for checkout or **Buy Now** for immediate purchase.
- **View Similar**: Tap the **View Similar** button overlaying a product image to find visually matching items.
- **Wishlist**: Tap the **Heart icon** on product cards or the product page to save items for later.

## Tips
- **fwd Store**: Use the **fwd** tab in the bottom bar to access a specialized store for "Under â‚¹999" trends and youthful styles.
- **Gamification**: Look for the **"Play to Slay"** floating button or banners to participate in games for rewards.
- **Price Crash**: Keep an eye out for pink **"Price Crash"** tags on listings to identify significant temporary price drops.
